DOC.brief_summary: Plant sterol stanols ( also call phytosterols phytostanols ) structurally relate cholesterol , absorb much less extent . Due structural similarity , plant sterol stanols inhibit intestinal cholesterol absorption lower serum LDL cholesterol concentration 10 % daily intakes 2.5 g. Plant sterol- stanol-enriched food product therefore widely available market low risk coronary heart disease . Plant sterols undergo oxidation , result formation oxyphytosterols . Animal study suggest oxyphytosterols atherogenic . Although oxyphytosterols identified human serum sample , effect increase intake plant sterols serum oxyphytosterol concentration human know . On hand , plant stanols oxidize low cholesterol absorption , also plant sterol absorption . The major objective present study examine effect dietary plant sterol stanols fast serum concentration oxyphytosterols . The minor objective investigate effect product postprandial serum oxyphytosterol concentration .
DOC.criteria: Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 2030 kg/m2 mean serum total cholesterol < 7.8 mmol/L mean serum triacylglycerol < 3.0 mmol/L mean plasma glucose < 6.1 mmol/L unstable body weight ( weight gain loss > 3 kg past two month ) active cardiovascular disease like congestive heart failure recent ( < 6 month ) event ( acute myocardial infarction , cerebral vascular incident ) severe medical condition might interfere study epilepsy , asthma , chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , inflammatory bowel disease rheumatoid arthritis indication treatment cholesterollowering drug accord Dutch Cholesterol Consensus use medication corticosteroid , diuretic lipid lower therapy abuse drug alcohol ( > 21 unit per week ) willing stop consumption vitamin supplement , fish oil capsule product rich sterol stanol ester 4 week start study ( washin period ) use investigational product within another biomedical study within previous month pregnant breastfeed woman willing give blood donor ( donate blood ) 8 week start study study current smoker anemia .
